page.title: 17Garway Population Survey
page.content: Our 59 houses contained 164 people, or an average of 2.78 per house. 9 people live alone, 23 houses contain 2 people, 11 have 3 people, 6 have 4, 8 have 5, and 2 have 6. Of these 164 people 27 are under 11 years old, 10 are between 11 and 17, 28 are 18-30, 59 are 30-60, and 40 are over 60. Of the 9 who live alone, 7 are over 60 - though only one has lived here all her life. In 40 of the 59 houses there is no-one under 18. Of 59 householders, 17 were born in Garway, and 10 more in Herefordshire. Of the rest, 13 were born in Wales, 4 abroad, 5 in London or the Home Counties, 8 north of Herefordshire and 2 elsewhere. 28 have lived in Garway for more than 25 years, 10 for between 10 and 25 years, 6 for 5-10 years, 10 for 1-5 years, and 5 for less than a year.
